snippet: Four of the seven candidates supported by Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s “super PAC” won their races.
abstract: Independence USA, super PAC started by New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, leads to mixed results, with $9.3 million funneled into seven races for the United States Senate, House of Representatives and statewide offices; Bloomberg personally gave $2.5 million to dozens of other candidates.
lead_paragraph: Four of the seven candidates supported by Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s “super PAC” won their races.

headline.seo: Bloomberg’s Campaign Contributions Yield Mixed Results
headline.main: Bloomberg’s Support Leads to Mixed Election Results
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg’s Support Leads To Mixed Election Results

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
